title: Shikogawa Dam
content:
Shikogawa Dam is a gravity dam located in Ehime Prefecture in Japan. The dam is used for irrigation and power production. The catchment area of the dam is 17.2Â km2. The dam impounds about 8  ha of land when full and can store 1300 thousand cubic meters of water. The construction of the dam was started on 1987 and completed in 2010.[1]

This article about a dam or floodgate on Shikoku, Japan is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
